entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 03:11 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1 except minus 5 in the Mary's Harbour area.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow or rain near midnight. Snow at times heavy inland and over higher terrain late this evening. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm except snowfall amount 20 cm inland and over higher terrain. Low plus 1 except minus 5 in the Mary's Harbour area. Forecast issued 9:15 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Snow at times heavy inland and over higher terrain. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm except snowfall amount 10 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 9:15 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain except snow inland and over higher terrain. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm except snowfall amount 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 9:15 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
